title: Medicaid Coverage of Blood Pressure Monitors and Cuffs
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Medicaid Coverage of Blood Pressure Monitors and Cuffs;  Defines "blood pressure monitor & cuff;" requiring AHCA to provide coverage for blood pressure monitors & cuffs under Medicaid pharmacy benefit for certain persons; provides requirements for coverage; provides that coverage of blood pressure monitors & cuffs includes cost of any necessary repairs or replacement parts; provides coverage qualification requirements for Medicaid recipients; requires agency to seek federal approval for implementation of coverage & to include rate impact in Medicaid managed medical assistance program & long-term care managed care program rates beginning on specified date.

actions.description: Referred to Health Care Facilities & Systems Subcommittee
Referred to Health Care Budget Subcommittee
Referred to Health & Human Services Committee
Now in Health Care Facilities & Systems Subcommittee
